thread.title: Veritas football rolls past St. John’s
thread.title_full: Veritas football rolls past St. John’s

author: J-W Staff Reports
title: Veritas football rolls past St. John’s
text:
October 2, 2015 
Advertisement 
Quarterback Michael Rask threw four touchdown passes and completed 13 of his 26 attempts for 198 yards to lead Veritas Christian Academy to a 58-12 victory against St. John’s Military on Friday. 
Rask had some help from the Eagles’ ground game as Will Easter ran for 160 yards and a touchdown on 21 carries. 
The Veritas defense turned up the pressure on St. John’s, recording seven sacks, three interceptions and recovering a fumble. The Eagles also were active on special teams with two recoveries of onside kicks. 
Veritas (4-1) has a bye next week. 
Veritas 24 6 22 6 — 58 
St. John’s 6 6 0 0 — 12 
Veritas – Chad Stieben 15 pass fromMichael Rask (Kalim Dowdell run). 
Veritas – Mark Weinhold 15 pass from Rask (Stieben pass from Rask). 
St. John’s – Tyler Adams 9 pass from Marshall Otter (2-point try failed). 
Veritas – Stieben 23 pass from Rask (Rask run). 
Veritas – Rask 22 run (2-point try failed). 
St. John’s – Jake Whitting 11 pass from Adams (2-point failed). 
Veritas – Dowdell 2 run (Easter run). 
Veritas – Will Easter 3 run (Hayden Tine from Rask). 
Veritas – Jacob Johnson 25 pass from Rask (2-point failed). 
Veritas – Rask 1 run (time expired).
